EmailTemplate.name: PC Level 2 - Additional Outlet
EmailTemplate.subject: foodpanda: Additional Outlet Sign Up
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Account.Name},
Good day.
We would like to thank you for your interest to sign up for the foodpanda delivery service in your other outlet.
Before we proceed, please help us by: 1. Completing the attached foodpanda Agreement 2. Please send us your camera-captured full dine-in menu for price verification and to make sure that all products are correctly added into your online menu, and a copy of your logo 3. Please provide us a Hero Listing image (4000 x 2080 px, below 25MB) for us to use as the background image on top of your menu page.
Please kindly fill in the foodpanda agreement and provide us the necessary documents, then we will proceed with the next process.
Should you have any concern, please let us know.
Hope you have a great day ahead!
Regards, <Agent Name>
